subsheet.name: Accessing from a process / object (Process Deleted)

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection containing nodes and values for child nodes (check/unchecl)

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

stage.name: Test 1 - Validate no prompt when permissions allowed
Test 2 - Validate prompt appears when permissions restricted

exception.detail: "Prompt was displayed when no permission restrictions were in place"

stage.name: Permission on opening process
stage.initialvalue: This process cannot be saved because you do not have permission to execute all linked processes or business objects. Please either remove the affected links or contact your administrator to obtain permission.

stage.name: Permission on saving process
stage.initialvalue: This process cannot be saved because you do not have permission to execute all linked processes or business objects. Please either remove the affected links or contact your administrator to obtain permission.

exception.detail: "Expected warning was not prompted when opening a procees linked to inaccessible an process"

input.name: Edit Summary
input.narrative: The summary to add to the audit trail for the process

input.name: Already Waiting
input.narrative: True if it's already waiting (i.e. don't press 'Save')

output.name: Warning on Save
output.narrative: Warning given when not possible to save due to inaccessible linked process or object

exception.detail: "Expected warning was not prompted when attempting to save a process linked to an inaccessible process"

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: Target Element
input.narrative: Element (Process/object/group) to display current Access rights

input.name: Nested?
input.narrative: Set flag if element is contained within another element

input.name: Nesting Structure
input.narrative: Provide a colleciton of parent elements to expand nodes

output.name: Access Rights Screen loaded
output.narrative: Flag set to true if screen successfully loaded

input.name: Set Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection with users and permissions to be set

input.name: Negative Test?
input.narrative: flag to change the flow so a user can attempt to set permissions when folder is not restritcted

output.name: Permissions Set?
output.narrative: Flag to indicate if permissions have been set

resource.action: Manage Access Rights Set Individual Permissions - Process

stage.name: Accessing from a process / object (Process Deleted)

input.name: Process Name
input.narrative: The name of the process you want to delete.

input.name: Deletion Reason
input.narrative: The reason you wish to delete the process.

input.name: Group to Expand
input.narrative: Group containing the process

stage.name: Validate prompt appears when process deleted (Access from Process)

input.name: Edit Summary
input.narrative: The summary to add to the audit trail for the process

input.name: Already Waiting
input.narrative: True if it's already waiting (i.e. don't press 'Save')

output.name: Warning on Save
output.narrative: Warning given when not possible to save due to inaccessible linked process or object

stage.name: Validate prompt appears when process deleted (Access from Object)
Test 1 - Validate no prompt when permissions allowed

input.name: Folder to Select
input.narrative: Name of folder the object you wish to select is contained within

input.name: Object Name
input.narrative: The name of the object you wish to open.

stage.name: Test 2 - Validate prompt appears when permissions restricted

exception.detail: "Prompt was displayed when no permission restrictions were in place"

stage.name: Permission on opening process
stage.initialvalue: This business object cannot be saved because you do not have permission to execute all linked processes or business objects. Please either remove the affected links or contact your administrator to obtain permission.

stage.name: Permission on saving process
stage.initialvalue: This business object cannot be saved because you do not have permission to execute all linked processes or business objects. Please either remove the affected links or contact your administrator to obtain permission.

exception.detail: "Expected warning was not prompted when opening an object linked to an inaccessible process"

input.narrative: True if it's already waiting (i.e. don't press 'Save')

output.name: Warning on Save
output.narrative: Warning given when not possible to save due to inaccessible linked process or object
